tool.name: genomes
tool.command:
parsec genomes install_genome
#if $func --func "$func" #end if #if $source --source "$source" #end if #if $dbkey --dbkey "$dbkey" #end if #if $ncbi_name --ncbi_name "$ncbi_name" #end if #if $ensembl_dbkey --ensembl_dbkey "$ensembl_dbkey" #end if #if $url_dbkey --url_dbkey "$url_dbkey" #end if #if $indexers --indexers "$indexers" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: func
input.help: Allowed values: 'download', Download and index; 'index', Index only

input.name: source
input.help: Data source for this build. Can be: UCSC, Ensembl, NCBI, URL

input.name: dbkey
input.help: DB key of the build to download, ignored unless 'UCSC' is specified as the source

input.name: ncbi_name
input.help: NCBI's genome identifier, ignored unless NCBI is specified as the source

input.name: ensembl_dbkey
input.help: Ensembl's genome identifier, ignored unless Ensembl is specified as the source

input.name: url_dbkey
input.help: DB key to use for this build, ignored unless URL is specified as the source

input.name: indexers
input.help: POST array of indexers to run after downloading (indexers[] = first, indexers[] = second, ...)
